## PolyAsyncIterable.includes() method

Returns whether an element is present in this iteration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
includes(obj: T): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | T | The element to search in the iteration |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise to whether `obj` is present in this iteration or not

## Remarks

If the element is found in the iteration, no more elements are iterated.
